tag: {display:{Name:'{"text":"幻术师之杖","italic": false,"color":"white"}',Lore:['[{"text":"按 ","color":"gray","italic": false},{"text":"[","color":"white"},{"keybind":"key.swapOffhand","color":"white"},{"text":"]","color":"white"}, " 发射一颗射程 40 米、弹速 30m/s 的烟雾魔弹，"]','{"text":"它会在命中或到达最大射程后触发，散布一片 5 米","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"半径的烟尘，并在触发时使其中的敌人失明 4 秒。","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"烟尘会持续遮蔽视线，并在 15 秒后消散。在友方视角","color":"gray","italic": false}','{"text":"中，烟尘的视线遮蔽程度相对较轻。","color":"gray","italic": false}','""','[{"text":"✳ 冷却  ","italic": false,"color":"aqua"},{"text":"20 秒","italic": false,"color":"white"}]','[{"text":"✏ 细节  按 [","color":"dark_gray","italic": false},{"keybind":"key.drop"}, "] 收起详情"]']},HideFlags:63}
